metadata.feature_description: Create, read, update, and delete influence scoring goals with 17 predefined goal types for tracking and scoring community interactions.

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Community Settings
steps.expected: Community Settings page with Influence section should be displayed
steps.actual: Community Settings page displayed with Influence section showing 13 existing goals

steps.action: Click Create New button
steps.expected: Create form should appear with Goal Type dropdown and input fields
steps.actual: Create form appeared with Goal Type dropdown (17 options), Weight, Value, Min Value, Max Value fields, and Cancel/Save buttons

steps.action: Select 'Average time on page' goal type and fill form with valid values (Weight: 5, Value: 10, Min: 0, Max: 100)
steps.expected: Form should accept all values
steps.actual: Form accepted all values correctly

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: New goal should be created and appear in the list with success message
steps.actual: Goal created successfully, 'Item successfully saved' notification shown, new goal 'Average time on page' appeared in list, total count increased from 13 to 14

steps.action: Click on 'Average time on page' row to open edit form
steps.expected: Edit form should open with current values populated
steps.actual: Edit form opened with Goal Type: Average time on page, Weight: 5, Value: 10, Min: 0, Max: 100

steps.action: Change Weight from 5 to 8 and click Save
steps.expected: Goal should be updated with new weight value
steps.actual: Goal updated successfully, 'Item successfully saved' notification shown, Weight changed to 8 in the list

steps.action: Hover over 'Average time on page' row to show delete button
steps.expected: Delete (X) button should appear in Actions column
steps.actual: Edit (pencil) and Delete (X) icons appeared in Actions column

steps.action: Click delete button
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog should appear
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with warning icon and message 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' with Cancel and Delete buttons

steps.action: Click Delete to confirm
steps.expected: Goal should be deleted from the list
steps.actual: Goal deleted successfully, 'Item successfully deleted' notification shown, 'Average time on page' removed from list, total count decreased from 14 to 13

steps.action: Click Create New and select an existing goal type ('The number of friends the user has')
steps.expected: Form should allow selection of existing goal type
steps.actual: Form allowed selection, existing goal type selected

steps.action: Fill valid values and click Save
steps.expected: System should prevent creating duplicate goal type
steps.actual: System prevented duplicate creation - total count remained at 13 items, no new entry was added to the list

issues: Duplicate validation message may not be prominently displayed to user - the save appears to succeed but no duplicate is actually created

test_scenarios.scenario_name: MinValue must be less than MaxValue validation

steps.action: Create new goal with Min Value (100) greater than Max Value (10)
steps.expected: Validation should prevent saving
steps.actual: Form filled with Min: 100, Max: 10

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: Validation error should appear, form should not close
steps.actual: Validation error indicator (red flag) appeared next to Min Value field, form remained open, save was prevented

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Value must be between MinValue and MaxValue validation

steps.action: Set valid Min (0) and Max (10) but Value (50) outside range
steps.expected: Form should accept input
steps.actual: Form accepted: Min: 0, Max: 10, Value: 50

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: Validation error should appear for Value field
steps.actual: Validation error indicator (red flag) appeared next to Value field, form remained open, save was prevented

steps.action: Enter negative value (-5) in Weight field
steps.expected: Form should accept input
steps.actual: Form accepted: Weight: -5

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: Validation error should appear indicating negative numbers not allowed
steps.actual: Validation error tooltip appeared: 'Negative numbers are not allowed', form remained open, save was prevented

steps.action: Clear all numeric fields (Weight, Value, Min Value, Max Value)
steps.expected: Form should allow empty fields
steps.actual: All fields cleared successfully

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: Validation errors should appear for all required fields
steps.actual: Validation error tooltips 'Text is required' appeared for all four fields (Weight, Value, Min Value, Max Value), form remained open

steps.action: Click Cancel button while create form is open with validation errors
steps.expected: Form should close without saving any changes
steps.actual: Form closed, no changes saved, list still shows 13 items unchanged

steps.action: Enter search term 'friends' in filter box
steps.expected: List should filter to show only matching goals
steps.actual: Search executed and filtered results - showed 'Showing 0 items' indicating search is working but may search by internal GoalType name rather than displayed title

issues: Search appears to filter by internal GoalType name rather than the displayed title, which may not match user expectations

steps.action: Click on Weight column header to sort
steps.expected: List should sort by Weight in ascending order
steps.actual: List sorted by Weight ascending: rows displayed in order 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 4, 10. Weight column header underlined indicating active sort

observations: 17 predefined goal types are available as documented: friends count, friends relative, posts authored, total likes, average likes, total views, average views, total responses, average responses, accepted answers, delivered ideas, active events, flagged content, average time on page, total time on site, number of logins, sum of votes
Search functionality works but appears to search by internal GoalType name rather than displayed title text
Duplicate GoalType validation prevents duplicates but error feedback to user may not be clearly visible - the system silently rejects the duplicate without a prominent error message
All validation error messages are displayed in red tooltip format next to the relevant field
GoalType dropdown shows all 17 options when creating a new goal
Edit form allows changing Weight, Value, MinValue, MaxValue but GoalType dropdown remains available for selection (code shows GoalType is part of the edit form)
